summary: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.
cast: Keanu Reeves|Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Anthony Quinn|Giancarlo Giannini|Angélica Aragón|Evangelina Elizondo|Freddy Rodríguez|Debra Messing|Febronio Covarrubias|Roberto Huerta|Juan Jiménez|Ismael Gallegos|Alejandra Flores|Gema Sandoval|Don Amendolia|Gregory Paul Martin|Mary Pat Gleason|John Dennis Johnston|Joseph Granda|Mark Matheisen|Macon McCalman|Ivory Ocean|Fred Burri|Stephanie Maislen|Brad Rea|Joe Troconis|Loren Zitomersky|Jana Rains Austinson|Jan Citron|Bret Culpepper|Anthony Fiorin|Julie Guevara|Erica Howard|Dana Walsh
keywords: falling in love|1940s|aftermath of world war ii|war aftermath|helping someone
title: Un paseo por las nubes
